title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: Liquid spill? SMC_LID high? Check backlight chip area for corrosion.

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message:
After a look to the board I saw no liquid corosion traces. 
What do you mean with SMC_LED high?
which IC is the backlight chip?

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message:
Duke said LID, not led.
Backlight chip is LP8545
Check schematic and see which chip creates Vled out for screen.

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: Voltage on SMC_LID? Inspect for corrosion around U7700.

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: SMC_LID is 3V44. and I don't see any corrosion arround the U7700

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: Got another LCD assembly to test?

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message:
I ve just tested the pin1 of the LVDS connector. it got no PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT.
then D7710: Anode has 12V7 but cathode zero. feedback is missing. what can it be?
maybe short R7732? will test in a minute.
No voltage devider is ok.
Q7701 gate is low 1V7. need to be more then 7V. pin1/2/3 are zero, and pin5 is 12V. will this mean the the U7700 is dead?

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: This can only happen when D7710 is dead/open. I have never seen this happen, test D7710 on diode mode.

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: Already done. seems to be normal. in diode mode test gives 0V3 forward. and in sper it gives zero.

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: Then there must be voltage on both sides.....

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message:
Are you measuring this with LCD plugged in? Q7701 is switching so nothing interesting to measure there.

You must verify this board with another LCD assembly to be sure it is ok.

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message:
Yes indeed. i was measuring with lcd plugged in. if measuring without LCd voltage must be there?
will test after 2 hours from now

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: Without LCD voltages will NOT be there.

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: Right. just tested and voltage was not there. Is another working display manatory or is there another methode?

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: Get a test assembly, a cracked one or something. Where are you located?

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message:
I m in The Netherlands.
And indeed I ve borrowed an LCD from a working mac. And indeed image showed up. thanks.
But there should be a way; a signal coming at the LVDS connector or from the LCD to the SMC for example that can confirm this problem, I presume.

Now the we know that the problem is the LCD. can we fix this issue if we disassemnle the LCD?

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: Buy a complete assembly! Make sure to order for the correct model year.

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: Okai. But how can you confirm that the LCD is dead by measuring signals on the LCD connector?

title: 820-3476-a chime with grey onscure beeld
message: You can't. Simple substitution confirmed already that your LCD is bad. You could try and swap the LCD cable, but anything past that is not worth the effort in my eyes and the assembly should be replaced.
